references.formattedCitation: Kovpanenko, H. T. Sarmatskoe pogrebenie I v.n.e na IUzhnom Buge. Kiev: Nauk. dumka, 1986. http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/18191053.

description: Burial mound of Sarmatian nobility from the 1st century CE in modern Mykolaiv Oblast, Ukraine with earlier remains from the Bronze Age. The mound has since been demolished by bulldozer.

properties.description: Associated modern location based on OpenStreetMap of Sokolova Mohyla, the modern village of Kovalivka after Kovpanenko 1986.
